I Made Some Icons

November 13, 2012

I made a winter / Christmas icon set to share with my internet friends for all they've taught me.

The community on the web gives me so much â€“ helping me grow in my craft and inspiring my work. I wanted to make a little something to give away and share with those who have shared with me.

Since winter is just around the corner, I whipped up some icons in Illustrator for you to download and use as you please. They might work well for a Christmas card or email, or printed out on wrapping paper.

Grab them here: neilrenicker.com/work/winter-icons/.
